general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are critical. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Manage water scarcity by applying sprinkler irrigation. Proper irrigation for maize crop. Apply Streptocyclin in tomato and brinjal. Mulch coconut leaves around a coconut tree. Cover newly planted vegetable seedlings with paper caps. Harvest fingerlings in shallow ponds if water temperature rises. Manage Yellow stem borer in paddy and Blast Disease.

advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are critical. Avoid water deficit during these stages.
High temperature increases water requirement of maize crop. Irrigate the crop timely.
Cover the rows with dry leaves. Top-dress with 4% potassium. Apply sprinkler irrigation. Irrigate frequently during hot months.
High temperature may lead to wilting. Apply 1g Streptocyclin in root zone.
Install pheromone traps. Spray neem-based pesticide during primary stage of pest infestation.
Check migration of caterpillars. For chemical control, spray recommended insecticides.
Treat okra seeds with Imidacloprid before sowing. Install yellow sticky traps to prevent whitefly infestation.
After harvesting, cut the tops leaving 2.0-2.5 cm above bulb. Dry harvested bulbs in a ventilated room.
To control mango hoppers, spray recommended insecticides. Use smoke below plants to reduce pest population.
